about_the_game:
Missed out on the Twitch exclusive Mullet Slayer Master Collection? Get it now to access new Slayer skins, podiums, animations and a new player icon and nameplate.

You get:
  • Mullet Slayer Skin
  • Two alternate Mullet Slayer skin variants
  • “The Den” Podium
  • Upgraded “Home Sweet Home” Podium variant.
  • “Yup” Stance animation
  • “Cheers” Victory animation
  • “Honk Honk” Intro animation
  • “Gone Huntin’” Icon
  • “Refuse to Lose” Nameplate
*This content requires the base game DOOM Eternal to play.

content_descriptors.notes: Similar to DOOM from 2016, DOOM Eternal will contain Blood and Gore, Intense Violence and Strong Language

detailed_description:
Missed out on the Twitch exclusive Mullet Slayer Master Collection? Get it now to access new Slayer skins, podiums, animations and a new player icon and nameplate.

You get:
  • Mullet Slayer Skin
  • Two alternate Mullet Slayer skin variants
  • “The Den” Podium
  • Upgraded “Home Sweet Home” Podium variant.
  • “Yup” Stance animation
  • “Cheers” Victory animation
  • “Honk Honk” Intro animation
  • “Gone Huntin’” Icon
  • “Refuse to Lose” Nameplate
*This content requires the base game DOOM Eternal to play.

name: Mullet Slayer Master Collection Cosmetic Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Mullet Slayer Master Collection Cosmetic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 / 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti (4GB), GTX 1060 (3GB), GTX 1650 (4GB) or AMD Radeon R9 280(3GB), AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB), RX 470 (4GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ( 1080p / 60 FPS / Low Quality Settings )
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB), NVIDIA GeForce 970 (4GB), AMD RX 480 (8GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ( 1080p / 60 FPS / High Quality Settings ) - *On NVIDIA GTX 970 cards Texture Quality should be set to Medium

oflc.descriptors: High impact violence, Blood and Gore, Online interactivity

short_description: Missed out on the Twitch exclusive Mullet Slayer Master Collection? Get it now to access new Slayer skins, podiums, animations and a new player icon and nameplate. *This content requires the base game DOOM Eternal to play.
